name: SupportEphraimAndDuessel
_source: speak;Duessel;Oh, Prince Ephraim.|Of course, my friend.
speak;Ephraim;I feel I should apologize for making you side against Grado in this.
speak;Duessel;Bah.|What nonsense!|Please, use me however you would to end this war.
speak;Ephraim;I want you to know how honored I am to fight at your side again.|Show me a little of your skill with the spear, like when you taught me.

speak;Duessel;Hmm...|Ephraim, your skills have grown significantly since then.|Why, the first time I met you, you could hardly hold a spear!|I couldn't even bring myself to lie and say you weren't THAT bad!
speak;Ephraim;...There's no need to be cruel!|I realized how helpless I was then.

speak;Duessel;Let me finish!|Even then, your strong will was most impressive.|On your first day wielding a spear, you chose to challenge ME!|I remember how enthusiastic your attack was.|You were determined to win.|But...you were destined to lose that day.|Still, I was quite shocked.|You weren't trying to learn my skill.|You were trying to steal it from me!|And I thought an apprentice was supposed to be obedient to his master.
speak;Ephraim;When you fight, you must respect your opponent, not obey him.|...Besides, you knocked me out so quickly, I hardly touched you.

speak;Duessel;I never dreamed of testing my skills against a prince of Renais.|After that match, though...|Oh, I changed my mind.|I knew it would be interesting to teach my skills to someone like you.
speak;Ephraim;Now, you're the one speaking nonsense!|Ah, I know...|Let's duel again after this battle!|I'm older now, better trained.|I'm sure I can beat you this time.
speak;Duessel;Hmmm...|Yes, fine.|I'd like to see if you've been keeping up with your training.
speak;Ephraim;Duessel, do you have a moment?
speak;Ephraim;...Were you thinking about Grado just now?|You looked distracted.|I wonder, was it the wrong decision to send you fighting against Grado?
speak;Duessel;...You've no need to worry.|My reasons for leaving Grado are my own.|It doesn't matter who I'm fighting.|My resolve won't be weakened.
speak;Ephraim;That is good to hear...|Actually, I'm here for a rematch.|I have no idea how you beat me last time, but this time, I can do it!

speak;Duessel;Hmm.|It looks like you haven't learned your lesson yet.|You know, they used to call me Obsidian.|I was one of the Imperial Three.|I'm not about to let a young punk like you best me at the spear!
speak;Duessel;Nicely done, Ephraim.|There's nothing left for me to teach you, it seems.

speak;Ephraim;That's utter nonsense.|I still have much to learn from you, Duessel.|I intend to be the greatest spearman Magvel has ever known.|I gave up on swords after seeing how they fare against spears.|Sword, axe, spear, bow...and even magic.|I've seen them all.|The spear always comes out on top.|And I want mine to be the best spear around.
speak;Duessel;Hm...|That's a bold statement.|But you may yet be the one who can prove it true, lad.
speak;Ephraim;...I thank you, Duessel.|It's only because of the skills you gave me that I'm alive and here now.|Our countries were friends, but you taught me like family...

speak;Duessel;I am a warrior.|All I can do is improve my skills and pass them on to a student.|And if you best me using the skills that I taught you, well...|That's just the nature of war.|The young surpass the old.|And I am glad to be fighting at the side of such a worthy student.
speak;Duessel;I know that I've been branded a traitor.|I'm prepared for that.|But I do have one regret...|I regret that I betrayed my emperor...

speak;Ephraim;You never betrayed him.|You remain as loyal to him now as when you swore your oaths.|No, it is Grado who has betrayed the ideals it once held dear.|And now, as then, you are my teacher.|Nothing has changed.|No, you are no traitor.|If anything, you are the last true man of Grado.

speak;Duessel;Ephraim...|Hm...|Yes.|A student should not inspire his teacher.|Ephraim.|Be strong.|Remain true.|Believe in yourself, and act in accordance with your beliefs.|...No matter what happens, be a strong king.

speak;Ephraim;Yes, you needn't worry about that.|Such has been my intention since the day I first held this spear.|No matter what the future holds...|I'm never going to change.|I will let my faith and my beliefs drive my every action as king.
